column2: ENGLISH

During the last few days, I have overheard the same conversation again and again. Apparently, a most renowned goldsmith is traveling through [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] and my courtiers are prattling excitedly about [smith.GetHerHis] work. Perhaps I should invite this [smith.GetManWoman] and employ [smith.GetHerHis] services?

The goldsmith, [smith.GetTitledFirstName], courteously accepted my invitation and arrived at court a mere week later. [smith.GetSheHeCap] has presented me with some sketches of [smith.GetHerHis] previous work and several letters of recommendation. I am assured of [smith.GetHerHis] skill, although I ask myself just how much money I can spare for a set of crown jewels.

I was overcome by excitement and curiosity when [smith.GetFirstName] informed me the crown jewels were completed! As I am waiting in my throne for [smith.GetHerHis] servants to carry the great box across the room I struggle not to leap up and meet them half-way. When I finally touch the heavy lid, my hands are shaking...

[smith.GetFirstName] has kept me up to date on the progress of the crown jewelry. I knew they were nearing completion, but when the heavy box was brought to me today, I was still momentarily breathless with excitement!

A heavy box has been brought before me. [smith.GetFirstName] has finished [smith.GetHerHis] work and the crown jewels are completed. While I expect no artifact of legends, I am still excited to see [smith.GetHerHis] handiwork.

A heavy box has been brought before me. [smith.GetFirstName] has finished [smith.GetHerHis] work and the crown jewels are completed. I expect something properly befitting my title as [Root.GetTitle] of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName], and I am excited to see [smith.GetHerHis] handiwork.
A heavy box has been brought before me. [smith.GetFirstName] has finished [smith.GetHerHis] work and the crown jewels are completed. I am excited to see what the handiwork of [smith.GetFirstName].

'Good news, my [Root.GetTitle],' [smith.GetFirstName] said excitedly. The goldsmith has informed me that precious metals and gemstones have been located in a nearby province. If we send an expedition, it could increase the quality of the crown jewels we are currently crafting.

The smith I hired has unfortunately died before finishing my order. It won't be easy to find another smith of similar skill... Luckily it seems not all the money I paid had yet been spent, and so I was able to recover a sizeable portion of my investment.

My [Root.job_marshal.GetJobTitle] [Root.job_marshal.GetDynName] has told me about a remarkable [GetWeaponArmorSmith] residing in [neighbor_province.GetName]. [Root.job_marshal.GetSheHeCap] suggested that I invite the [smith.GetManWoman] to my court to see [smith.GetHerHis] work for myself. If [smith.GetSheHe] manages to impress me, I could order my own custom made item.

The word around the court is that a remarkable [GetWeaponArmorSmith] is residing in [neighbor_province.GetName]. Perhaps I should invite the [smith.GetManWoman] to my court to see [smith.GetHerHis] work for myself. If [smith.GetSheHe] manages to impress me, I could order my own custom made item.

Once the [GetWeaponArmorSmith]'s craftsmanship had been checked by my most knowledgeable attendants to ensure the quality was sufficient, I received [smith.GetHerHim] in the throne room. [smith.GetSheHeCap] introduced [smith.GetHerselfHimself] as '[smith.GetMasterMistressCap] [smith.GetFirstName]' and gestured towards [smith.GetHerHis] numerous assistants, who all carried examples of [smith.GetHerHis] work. 'Does my [Root.GetTitle] have anything special in mind?'

'A [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]. I see. An excellent choice, my [Root.GetTitle]' says [smith.GetMasterMistressCap] [smith.GetFirstName] and calls forward an assistant cradling several [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]s in [smith.GetHerHis] arms. 'I have a couple of examples here. One must determine what one need and how much one is willing to pay, though they would all serve your Highness well.'

I was struck with nervous excitement when [smith.GetMasterMistressCap] [smith.GetFirstName] announced that the [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] was nearing its completion. Today I have received the [smith.GetMasterMistressCap] in my throne room. A sturdy box is in [smith.GetHerHis] arms, and as [smith.GetSheHe] opens the lid, I find it almost impossible to breathe. 'What will you name her, my [Root.GetTitle]?'

I was struck with nervous excitement when [smith.GetMasterMistressCap] [smith.GetFirstName] announced that the [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] was nearing its completion. Today I have received the [smith.GetMasterMistressCap] in my throne room. As [smith.GetSheHe] unveils the armor rack, I find it almost impossible to breathe. 'What will you name her, my [Root.GetTitle]?'

Finally, the [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] has been completed! [smith.GetMasterMistressCap] [smith.GetFirstName] has brought me a sturdy box which contains the item. My hands are shaking slightly as I open its heavy lid...

[smith.GetMasterMistressCap] [smith.GetFirstName]'s main assistant has brought me the finished [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]. There are no engravings or precious materials to enhance it, but the design has some elegance of its own. Looking pretty is not her main purpose, anyway.

[smith.GetMasterMistressCap] [smith.GetFirstName]'s main assistant has finally brought me the finished [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] I have been waiting for. It is a beautiful and elegant [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon], and I am excited to see it goes beyond my original expectations.

[smith.GetMasterMistressCap] [smith.GetFirstName]'s main assistant has brought me the finished [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]. It is an elegant though simple design, and it looks like a fine quality weapon I can bring to war.

'Good news, my [Root.GetTitle],' [smith.GetFirstName] said excitedly. The [GetWeaponArmorSmith] has informed me that precious metals and special tools have been located in a nearby province. If we send an expedition, it could increase the quality of the [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] we are currently crafting.
What type of smith do you wish to send word for?

It has been many weeks since I commissioned [smith.GetMasterMistressCap] [smith.GetFirstName] to work for me and today my council has informed me that [smith.GetFirstName] has fled from my lands to the court of [smith.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]! Taking the work promised to me and any gold left with [smith.GetHerHim]!

As I was walking towards [smith.GetMasterMistressCap] [smith.GetFirstName]'s smithy I could not hear the sound of progress but instead the sound of voices talking. I found [smith.GetFirstName] and my [smith_event_target.GetRootRelation] [smith_event_target.GetTitledFirstName] discussing different metals and their compositions. All this talk was making my head spin and definitely halting the progress on the work I have ordered...

During the afternoon as I went to check on the progress of [smith.GetMasterMistressCap] [smith.GetFirstName] I walked in to see [smith.GetHerHim] getting my [smith_event_target.GetRootRelation] [smith_event_target.GetTitledFirstName] to help with the forging process. Together they were lifting pieces of metal and [smith.GetFirstName] was showing [smith_event_target.GetFirstName] how to mold the materials into shape. Not exactly what I am paying [smith.GetHerHim] for but a form of service nonetheless...

Having decided to check up on [smith.GetMasterMistressCap] [smith.GetFirstName]'s progress I strolled over to [smith.GetHerHis] forge. I did not find [smith.GetHerHim] working on the project I commissioned but instead working on a different task... specifically my [smith_event_target.GetRootRelation] [smith_event_target.GetTitledFirstName]!

I was taking a relaxing walk this morning when suddenly I heard a scream pierce through the air! I rushed to the source and saw that it was [smith.GetMasterMistressCap] [smith.GetFirstName] wailing in [smith.GetHerHis] forge. From what I could gather, between the servants chatter and [smith.GetFirstName]'s crying, there was an accident involving some molten metal! It is lucky that [smith.GetFirstName] is alive. Yet this will definitely impede [smith.GetHerHis] work...
The castle blacksmith, more used to horseshoes and helmets than work fit for royalty, presented you with a dirty old box. "Ta da" he says, nervously, "It was a sword you wanted right?" he adds.
The castle blacksmith, more used to horseshoes and helmets than work fit for royalty, presented you with a dirty old box. "Ta da" he says, nervously, "It was armor you wanted right?" he adds.

I was struck with nervous excitement when [smith.GetMasterMistressCap] [smith.GetFirstName] announced that the [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] was nearing its completion. Today I have received the [smith.GetMasterMistressCap] in my throne room. A sturdy box is in [smith.GetHerHis] arms, and as [smith.GetSheHe] opens the lid, I find it almost impossible to breathe. 'What will you name her, my [Root.GetTitle]?'

I was struck with nervous excitement when [smith.GetMasterMistressCap] [smith.GetFirstName] announced that the [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] was nearing its completion. Today I have received the [smith.GetMasterMistressCap] in my throne room. As [smith.GetSheHe] unveils the armor rack, I find it almost impossible to breathe. 'What will you name her, my [Root.GetTitle]?'

I was overcome by excitement and curiosity when [smith.GetFirstName] informed me the crown jewels were completed! As I am waiting in my throne for [smith.GetHerHis] servants to carry the great box across the room I struggle not to leap up and meet them half-way. When I finally touch the heavy lid, my hands are shaking...
Nothing displays authority like fine jewelry.
Invite the famous goldsmith to your court.
One and all shall see the indisputable might of house [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName]!
Spare no expenses and order the most expensive crown jewels money can buy.\n
Regalia worthy of a true [Root.GetTitle]!
[From.GetFirstName] is truly a master!
Let us see what [smith.GetSheHe] has accomplished...
Send someone to the end of the world, if need be!
Spend money to potentially get even better crown jewels than you originally ordered.
But the amount I lost is also sizeable.
A fine idea, [Root.job_marshal.GetJobTitle] [Root.job_marshal.GetFirstName]!
What a fine idea, how clever I am!
Invite the [GetWeaponArmorSmith] to your court.
You can never go wrong with a good sword.
Swords may give a bonus to commanded §YLight Infantry§! and §YHeavy Foot Troops§!, as well as §YMartial§!, §YPersonal Combat Skill§! and §YMonthly Prestige§!.\n
I would not go in to battle with anything but the very best.

Order a [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] of the highest quality. This armor will give you §G+10%§! to §YMorale Offense§!, §G+0.75§! §YMonthly Prestige§!, §G+1§! §YMartial§! and §G+2§! §YPersonal Combat Skill§!.
Order a [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] of the highest quality.
Order a [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] of the highest quality.
Order a [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] of the highest quality.
Order a [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] of the highest quality.
Order a [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] of the highest quality.
Order a [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] of the highest quality.
This armor shall be my Guardian.
This axe will be known as Cleaver!
This bow will be known as Silent Wind!
This lance will be known as The Impaler!
The Foe Hammer!
The Golden Scimitar!
This sword will be known as Heartseeker!
This is excellent, [smith.GetMasterMistressCap] [smith.GetFirstName]!
I am sure she will serve me well.
Spend money to potentially get an even better [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] than the one you originally ordered.
A weaponsmith to forge me a deadly weapon!
How dare [smith.GetSheHe] betray me!
There is no harm in [smith.GetFirstName] taking some time to help [smith_event_target.GetFirstName].
I am glad [smith.GetFirstName] is helping [smith_event_target.GetFirstName] to be stronger!
What [smith.GetFirstName] does in the privacy of [smith.GetHerHis] own forge is not my concern...
I will help you in any way I can [smith.GetMasterMistressCap] [smith.GetFirstName].
Oh dear.
This armor will be my Angelic Guardian.
This ax will be known as The Dragon Cleaver!
This bow will be known as Death Wind!
This lance will be known as Ascalon!
The Skullcrusher!
Golden Vengeance!
This sword will be known as Dragonseeker!
I want a heavy two-handed sword.
This sword can only be handled by a strong warrior, but is sure to impress friend and foe alike.
I have no money to spare for such frivolities.
Do not invite the goldsmith to your court.
I will order something impressive, but sensible.
I will order an impressive set of jewels.
Order crown jewels which are 'impressive, but sensible'.\n
Thorough craftsmanship and expensive materials is the key to beauty.
I am not made of money. Do your best with what is available.
Settle with the crown jewels you originally ordered.
At least it was not a total loss.
Our own smiths are capable enough!
Do not invite the [GetWeaponArmorSmith] to your court.
You can never go wrong with a good scimitar.
Scimitars may give a bonus to commanded §YLight Infantry§! and §YHeavy Foot Troops§!, as well as §YMartial§!, §YPersonal Combat Skill§! and §YMonthly Prestige§!.\n
I do not need any frills, craft me something effective.
Craft me the best quality [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] you can.
Order a good quality [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]. This armor will give you §G+5%§! to §YMorale Offense§!, §G+0.5§! §YMonthly Prestige§!, §G+1§! §YMartial§! and §G+1§! §YPersonal Combat Skill§!.
Order a good quality [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]. This [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] will increase your §YMorale Offense§!, §YMonthly Prestige§!, §YMartial§! and §YPersonal Combat Skill§!.
Order a high quality [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]. This [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] will greatly increase your §YMorale Offense§!, §YMonthly Prestige§!, §YMartial§! and §YPersonal Combat Skill§!.
Order a good quality [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon].
Order a good quality [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon].
Order a high quality [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon].
Order a good quality [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon].
Order a good quality [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon].
Order a high quality [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon].
Order a good quality [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon].
Order a good quality [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon].
Order a high quality [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon].
Order a good quality [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon].
Order a good quality [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon].
Order a high quality [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon].
Order a good quality [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon].
Order a high quality [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon].
Order a good quality [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon].
Order a good quality [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon].
Order a high quality [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon].
With this armor I shall be a Champion.
My every foe shall fear The Ravager!
My every foe shall fear Lightning!
My every foe shall fear The Trident!
My every foe shall fear The Bone Breaker!
Scimitar of Fortune is a fitting name, no?
My every foe shall fear Vengeance!
Settle with the [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] you originally ordered.
I am in need of a new set of armor, find me the finest armorsmith around.
Oh, I don't think so.
The smith will never reach their destination and your treasures will be recovered.
This is not why [smith.GetFirstName] is here!
[smith.GetFirstName]'s job is to be forging for me. Not playing with children.
Can you please focus on your work!
No cripple can finish the work! Send [smith.GetHerHim] away!
This will be my Green Armor.
My every foe shall fear Heaven's Devastator!
My every foe shall fear Lightning Strike!
My every foe shall fear Bleeding Lance!
My every foe shall fear The Twilights Hammer!
Scimitar of the Night is a fitting name, no?
My every foe shall fear Heaven's Vengeance!
Surely good craftsmanship is the most important aspect?
Order a beautiful set of crown jewels.
Proper craftsmanship is enough for me.
Order the least costly set of crown jewels.\n
Order a set of crown jewels befitting my status.
Order the cheaper set of crown jewels.
Send [smith.GetHerHim] immediately!
Spend money to potentially get even better crown jewels than you originally ordered.
Thankfully I didn't lose too much.
The smiths in our own [the_armory.GetName] are capable enough!
This option is available because you have a §Y[the_wonder.GetWonderTypeShortCap]§! with an §Y[the_armory.GetName]§!.
A lance is what I desire.
Lances may give a bonus to commanded §YPikemen§! and §YMounted Troops§!, as well as §YMartial§!, §YPersonal Combat Skill§! and §YMonthly Prestige§!.\n
I am sure whatever you make is good enough, [smith.GetMasterMistressCap].
Craft me something of high quality, that I can bring with me to combat.
Craft me something effective yet inexpensive, [smith.GetMasterMistressCap].
Order the cheapest [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]. This armor will give you §G+0.25§! §YMonthly Prestige§!, §G+1§! §YMartial§! and §G+1§! §YPersonal Combat Skill§!.
Order the cheapest [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]. This [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] will increase your §YMonthly Prestige§!, §YMartial§! and §YPersonal Combat Skill§! slightly.
Order the [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]. This [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] will increase your §YMonthly Prestige§!, §YMartial§! and §YPersonal Combat Skill§!.
Order the cheaper [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]. This [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] will increase your §YMonthly Prestige§!, §YMartial§! and §YPersonal Combat Skill§! somewhat.
Order the cheapest [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon].
Order the cheapest [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon].
Order the [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon].
Order the cheaper [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon].
Order the cheapest [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon].
Order the cheapest [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon].
Order the [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon].
Order the cheaper [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon].
Everyone shall fear the Warden.
She looks like a Marauder, doesn't she?
She looks like an Eagle, doesn't she?
The Piercer is a fitting name, no?
The Shatterer is a fitting name, no?
Scimitar of Conquest!
She looks like a Fury, doesn't she?
Spend money to potentially get an even better [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] than the one you originally ordered.
Find me a goldsmith to create jewels befitting of my status.
This is not what I pay you for! Get out and stay out!
Everyone shall fear the Immortal.
She looks like a Darkbringer, doesn't she?
She looks like an Ice Eagle, doesn't she?
Death Strike is a fitting name, no?
The Giant Shatterer is a fitting name, no?
Scimitar of Death.
She looks like a [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]'s Fury, doesn't she?
I have changed my mind. You services are no longer required.
Dismiss §Y[smith.GetTitledFirstName]§!.
Do what you can with local materials.
Settle with the crown jewels you originally ordered.
I have always been one for axes.
Axes may give a bonus to commanded §YHeavy Infantry§! and §YLight Foot Troops§!, as well as §YMartial§!, §YPersonal Combat Skill§! and §YMonthly Prestige§!.\n
Actually, I changed my mind.
Order nothing
Settle with the [smith.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] you originally ordered.
Actually now may not be the best time...
How dare [smith.GetFirstName] dishonor me like this! [smith.GetSheHeCap] must be punished.
I will crush my enemies with a mace!
Maces may give a bonus to commanded §YLight Cavalry§! and §YHeavy Foot Troops§!, as well as §YMartial§!, §YPersonal Combat Skill§! and §YMonthly Prestige§!.\n
A fine bow would serve me well.
Bows may give a bonus to commanded §YArchers§! and §YMounted Troops§!, as well as §YMartial§!, §YPersonal Combat Skill§! and §YMonthly Prestige§!.\n
I am in need of protection! Make me a strong and sturdy set of armor.
Armor provides a bonus to §YMorale Offense§!, as well as §YMartial§!, §YPersonal Combat Skill§! and §YMonthly Prestige§!.
You cannot have duplicates of the same artifacts of the same quality in your treasury and have therefore received some of your investment back.
You finally receive your long awaited ax.
You finally receive your long awaited bow.
You finally receive your long awaited lance.
You finally receive your long awaited mace.
You finally receive your long awaited scimitar.
You finally receive your long awaited sword.
